Featured Tutorial

Using the Thinking Process Feature

Learn how to use the 'show_thinking' parameter to see the LLM's reasoning process.

The Surfer API includes a powerful feature that allows you to see the LLM's reasoning process as it generates a response. This provides transparency into how the model approaches problems and arrives at conclusions.

This tutorial covers:

  • What the thinking process is and how it works
  • How to enable it in your API calls
  • Benefits of using the thinking process
  • Advanced usage with streaming responses
  • Best practices and technical details
Read the Tutorial

Example

import requests

response = requests.post(
    "http://localhost:8000/api/chat",
    json={
        "prompt": "Solve this math problem...",
        "model": "deepseek-r1:1.5b",
        "show_thinking": True
    }
)

result = response.json()
print("Response:", result["response"])
print("Thinking:", result["thinking_process"])
